comments.text: Really interesting project, I like the idea! It would be great to see some automation run weekly checks on new/unchecked files.
comments.author: Ben Gunter

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Three years of experience teaching Python. Primary scripting language for malware-analysis sandbox (Flask + VirusTotal API) and Kaggle dataset ETL; experienced with asyncio, Pandas, and type-hinting.

skills.name: C / C++
skills.description: Wrote cryptography labs (RSA, MD5-collision) and a CLI banking app that connects to SQL Server via ODBC; comfortable with pointers, memory management, and makefiles.

skills.name: Git & GitHub
skills.description: Version-controlled projects (React site, malware sandbox, Vigenere Cipher) using Git flow and pull requests on GitHub; comfortable rebasing, resolving complex merge conflicts, and automating CI.

skills.name: Node.js & Express
skills.description: Developed RESTful back-ends and a JSON-server mock API for Hackazon penetration-testing labs; implemented JWT auth, rate-limiting, and logging with Morgan and Winston.

skills.name: Docker
skills.description: Containerized malware-sandbox Flask app with multi-stage builds, non-root user execution, and health checks; configured docker-compose for local development with environment management, volume mounts, and resource limits.

skills.name: Burp Suite
skills.description: Performed dynamic scans on the Hackazon e-commerce app, scripted Intruder attacks, and wrote custom BApp extensions to validate token misconfiguration findings.

skills.name: React + Redux
skills.description: Built this portfolio and a multi-user code-editor prototype with React hooks and Redux Toolkit; optimized slices, lazy-loaded routes, and wrote custom middleware for API status handling.

skills.name: Sqlmap
skills.description: Automated detection/ exploitation of SQLi in Hackazon's mobile API; exported PoCs.

skills.name: Bootstrap
skills.description: Bootstrap Outfitters supplies you with the gear you need at prices you can't beat.

skills.name: Network & Security Tools
skills.description: Daily driver: Nmap, Netdiscover, Wireshark, and OpenSSL for enumeration and packet analysis; studying toward CompTIA Network+ and Security+ certifications.

skills.name: SQL
skills.description: Write complex queries, joins, and window functions in MySQL and SQL Server; designed normalized schemas and tuned indexes for a Flask-based malware-analysis dashboard.

skills.name: Linux
skills.description: Daily driver for cybersecurity labs: configure Ubuntu/Kali boxes, automate tasks with Bash, manage services with systemd, and harden servers using iptables and Fail2Ban.

skills.name: PowerShell
skills.description: Authored scripts for a two-tier Windows backup: weekly full mirrors with Copy-Item and daily incrementals via Robocopy, all scheduled and logged automatically.

certifications.name: Nucamp Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
certifications.description: Completed July 2024 — Built full-stack apps with React, Node, Express & MongoDB
